text.p: Prices on the New York Stock Exchange
ended mixed in moderate trading Thursday.
The Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 32.51 points to 6976.48.
The average price per share was down $0.13.

Volume was 459,341,810 from 556,042,370 on Wednesday. NNNthe market pays much attention to the other ones including the University of Michigan," said Sung Won Sohn, chief economist at Norwest Corp. If it shows a small increase or decrease, I don't think it makes a whole lot of difference, he said.
At the same time as the University of Michigan report, leading indicators are due out, with March expected to show a 0.2 percent rise after a 0.5 percent gain in February.
